message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $125. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $100?

Hey Bob, I understand you're on a budget, and I'm willing to work with you. How about we split the difference and I go down to $112.50? This would still give you a good deal while helping me reach my target.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to keep my spending within $100. Could you consider $100 as a fair offer?

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit worried that we might not be able to come to an agreement.  I'm really flexible, but I can't go lower than $105.  This would give you a great deal while still allowing me to cover my costs.  What do you think?
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still aiming for $100. Can we meet in the middle at $102.5?

Bob, I'm really trying to make this work.  I'm willing to come down to $103.50, which is a big compromise on my end.  This is my final offer. If you're not able to meet this, I'll have to go with another buyer.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering your last offer, I believe $103 would be a fair price for both of us.
